content.rendered:
Experience the best FREE live entertainment from country music’s biggest stars and enjoy rodeo drink specials at the home of the Official NFR After-Party of the PRCA! Click here to know how to watch NFR Las Vegas 2023 live online.

Recurring Nightly Events

NFR After Dark at Westgate Las Vegas

  • December 7 — 16
  • 4 p.m. — Free entertainment in iBar
  • 5:15 p.m. — 8:30 p.m. — Viewing parties in iBar and Cabaret Theater
  • 8:30 p.m. — 10 p.m. — Free concerts in Cabaret Theater
  • 10:30 p.m. — 2 a.m. — Live entertainment in iBar
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit www.westgatelasvegas.com

South Point Presents Ram Rodeo Tailgate Party

  • December 7 — 16
  • 5 p.m. — 10 p.m.
  • South Point Convention Center
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Boyd’s Rodeo Viewing Party

  • December 7 — 16
  • Opens at 5 p.m.
  • The Orleans Hotel & Casino — Bourbon Street Lounge
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public — 21 & Up
  • For more information, visit www.BoydGaming.com/NFR

Gilley’s Saloon at Treasure Island

  • December 7 — 16
  • 5 p.m. — Close Gilley’s Saloon, Dance Hall & Bar-B-Que
  • Viewing party starts at 5 p.m. All Ages until 9 p.m.
  • Live entertainment to follow and drink specials nightly!
  • Cover charge is $20 at the door after 9 p.m. No charge for guests arriving prior to 9 p.m. (21+ after 9 p.m.)
  • Free Admission prior to 9 p.m./Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit www.TreasureIsland.com or www.gilleyslasvegas.com

Silverton Casino Presents NFR Viewing & After Parties

  • December 7 — 16
  • Opens at 5 p.m.
  • Live, free all-ages viewing parties followed by live entertainment
  • Veil Pavilion
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit https://silvertoncasino.com/

Palms Casino Resort

  • December 7 — 16
  • 5:15 p.m. — Live Viewing Party in KAOS or Mabel’s BBQ
  • 9:30 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. — Live concerts each night following the Viewing Party in KAOS or Mabel’s BBQ
  • 10 p.m. — Close — Round Up the night with a captivating view mixed with high-energy music in Ghostbar
  • Free Parking for fans!
  • Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit https://www.palms.com/experiences/nfr/

Rodeo Nation at Mandalay Bay

  • December 7 — 16
  • Starting at 5:45 p.m.
  • Mandalay Bay’s BetMGM Sportsbook
  • Live NFR Viewing Party followed by free concert series featuring Hailey Whitters, Easton Corbin and more
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit www.MandalayBay.com/NFR

The Mirage — Viewing Party and Rodeo After Party

  • December 7 — 16
  • 5:45 p.m. — 12 a.m.
  • Live viewing party followed by free concerts nightly from Country Music’s Biggest Stars
  • Daily drink specials and giveaways
  • Must be 21+ to enter
  • The Mirage Race & Sports Book
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit www.Mirage.com/NFR

MGM Grand Gold Buckle Zone

  • December 7 — 16
  • 6 p.m. — 4 a.m.
  • Live viewing parties followed by free concerts and DJ
  • Level Up
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit https://mgmgrand.mgmresorts.com/en/entertainment/nfr.html

Rodeo Vegas ? The After Party

  • December 7 — 16
  • Opens at 8 p.m.
  • Resorts World — Event Center
  • Live entertainment nightly after the NFR Viewing Party
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public
  • For more information, visit www.RodeoVegas.com

Orleans After Party

  • December 7 — 16
  • Nightly at 8:30 p.m.
  • The Orleans Hotel & Casino — Bourbon Street Lounge
  • Live entertainment, dancing, special guests and giveaways
  • Free admission/Open to the Public — 21 & Up
  • For more information, visit www.BoydGaming.com/NFR

Wrangler NFR Go Round Buckle Presentations hosted by Flint Rasmussen & Joe Beaver

  • December 7 — 15
  • 9:30 p.m. (with live broadcast on The Cowboy Channel)
  • South Point Showroom
  • Free concerts to follow each night in the South Point Showroom: Aaron Watson on Dec. 7-10, Randall King on Dec. 13-14, & Ghost Houndson Dec. 15-16
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public

Single Events

18th Annual Wrangler Gold Buckle Gala benefiting the ProRodeo Hall of Fame

  • December 4
  • 6 p.m. — Reception and Silent Auction
  • 7 p.m. — Dinner
  • 8 p.m. — Live Auction and Legend Presentation, Entertainment following
  • Honoring Red Steagall with the 2023 Legend of ProRodeo Award
  • South Point Hotel and Casino Grand Ballroom
  • Ticket Required
  • For more information and tickets, click here!

Miss Rodeo America Cowgirl Kickoff

  • December 4
  • 7:30 p.m. — 9:30 p.m.
  • South Point Showroom
  • Ticket Required
  • For more information, visit www.missrodeoamerica.com

Road to the Gold Buckle — Gold Carpet Contestant Welcome

  • December 5
  • 5 p.m. — 6 p.m.
  • South Point Hotel and Casino — Adjacent to the Benny Binion statue
  • Open to the Public for Viewing

NFR Contestants Reception

  • December 5
  • 6 p.m. — 9 p.m.
  • South Point Grand Ballroom
  • PRCA Convention Attendees Only

PRCA Annual Awards Banquet

  • December 6
  • 6 p.m.
  • South Point Grand Ballroom
  • Ticket Required
  • Tickets will be at https://www.prcaconvention.com/ in late October

Cinch Western Kickoff Party

  • December 6
  • 10 p.m. — midnight
  • South Point Showroom
  • Free Admission/Open to the Public — 21 & Up

Pink Part at The STRAT

  • December 11
  • 9 p.m. — midnight
  • The STRAT Tower Level 108
  • A percentage of ticket sales goes to support The National Breast Cancer Foundation
  • Ticket Required

Source: nfrexperience.com
